posts.post_content:
I seem to be stuck on the final 6 cards to go for the set.  I know that there are at least a couple of other board members looking for some of these same cards but I thought I'd give it a shot.  I need:

Birmingham
Donlin
Donnelly
Fisher (white cap)
Kuhn
McCarthy

I have tons of tobacco and caramel cards available to trade including many HOF'ers and short prints.  Would also be glad to buy.  Condition is of no concern at this point so a beater with bullet holes looks gem mint to me.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any offers.  Thanks for looking!

My New Year's resolution is to complete this set!  I still need these final 6 cards.  I have tons to trade or will be glad to buy as well.  Please send a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] if you have any of these available.  Thanks and Happy New Year to all.

If I catch a leprechaun today, I will let him keep the pot of gold if he can lead me to any of these final 6 T207's that I need for my set:

Birmingham
Donlin
Donnelly
Fisher (white cap)
Kuhn
McCarthy

Tons of quality tradebait and cash to spend if anybody has any of these available.  Thanks!
